metadata.title: Darn Tough (8017 Snowpack OTC Midweight with Cushion Men's Sock
features: Midweight with Cushion — This fine gauge knitted sock provides mid-level cushion density under your foot. True Seamless technology allows for an undetectable seam fusion for an Ultra-smooth, invisible feel.
Over-the-calf Height — The name says it all. The best sock to keep the outside - out.

Composition — Knit with 58% Merino Wool, 40% Nylon, 2% Lycra Spandex. The fast action wicking pulls moisture away from the skin, so no more sweaty, stinky socks. The soft, breathable merino wool has fast drying, all weather performance that keeps you cool in the summer and warm in the winter.
Guaranteed for Life — if these socks wear, tear, or develop holes, Darn Tough will replace them. No strings. No conditions. For life.
Made in the USA — Every pair of socks is knit in Northfield, Vermont, the perfect testing ground for the finest premium all- weather performance socks.
description: Darn Tough 8017-C-3013-04 Snowpack OTC Midweight with Cushion Charcoal Medium
